step.datasource: select case when (convert(date, current_timestamp) = convert(date,(SELECT DATEADD(DAY,DATEDIFF(DAY,'1900-01-05',DATEADD(MONTH,DATEDIFF(MONTH,'1900-01-01',GETDATE()),'1900-01-31'))/7*7,'1900-01-05')))) then ('0') else ('1') end -- only if current date is las friday of the month
step.stepname: Controleer of laatste vrijdag van de maand

step.datasource:
truncate table [dbo].[_AB_prognose] ; INSERT INTO [400].dbo._AB_Prognose ([Artcode] ,[oms25] ,[Warehouse] ,[aantal] ,[bud_vers] ,[Datum] ,[reknr] ,[bkjrcode] ,[periode] ,[CompanyCode] ,[TransactionType] ,[FreeField1] ,[Transsubtype] ,[bdr_val] ,[kstplcode] ,[Koop_maak] ,[voorraadkenmerk] ,[artikeltype] ,[voorraadpolicy] ,[leverancier] ,[Status] ,[syscreated])
SELECT
[Artcode] , [oms25] , [Warehouse] , [aantal] , [bud_vers] , [Datum] , [reknr] , [bkjrcode] , [periode] , [CompanyCode] , [TransactionType] , [FreeField1] , [Transsubtype] , [bdr_val] , [kstplcode] , [Koop_maak] , [voorraadkenmerk] , [artikeltype] , [voorraadpolicy] , [leverancier] , '1' as Status , current_timestamp as syscreated
FROM [400].[dbo].[_AB_productieprognose]
step.stepname: Dump view met budgetregels in tussentabel
